headline: Constellation Brands CEO Shift To Nicholas Fink Raises Execution Questions
summary: Constellation Brands, NYSE:STZ, has appointed Nicholas Fink as its next CEO and President. Fink will succeed current CEO Bill Newlands, with the leadership transition effective April 13, 2026. The move brings in an executive with extensive beverage and premium brand experience, along with a background in digital transformation and market expansion. Constellation Brands enters this leadership change with its shares at $149.3 and a mixed recent track record, including a 9.1% decline over the...
